hooks.command: terminal-notifier -title "ðŸ”” Claude Code" -group "$(basename $(pwd)) " -message "$(basename $(pwd)) needs permission" -sender com.apple.Terminal -sound Bottle
terminal-notifier -title "ðŸ”” Claude Code" -group "$(basename $(pwd)) " -message "$(basename $(pwd)) needs input" -sender com.apple.Terminal -sound Bottle
terminal-notifier -title "ðŸ”” Claude Code" -group "$(basename $(pwd)) " -message "$(basename $(pwd)) has stopped" -sender com.apple.Terminal -sound Blow

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); model_id=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.id'); total_in=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_input_tokens'); total_out=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_output_tokens'); case "$model_id" in *opus-4*) ip=15.00; op=75.00;; *sonnet-4*) ip=3.00; op=15.00;; *opus*) ip=15.00; op=75.00;; *sonnet*) ip=3.00; op=15.00;; *haiku*) ip=0.80; op=4.00;; *) ip=3.00; op=15.00;; esac; cost=$(echo "scale=2; ($total_in * $ip + $total_out * $op) / 1000000" | bc); printf "%s | Cost: \$%s" "$model" "$cost"
